title: Congratulations
body:
Congratulations RIOT on making the game and overall system even worse

And to complete your absolute failure you're going to release a champion that can take peoples summoner spells. As if flash wasn't the biggest impact to the games overall Meta you decide this was a great idea.

Please give yourselves a big pat on the back for being an absolute bunch of idiots

replies.body:
Its called a 'new' champion for a reason? 

I appreciate all the work Riot's doing in terms of making new things such as runes reforged. The 'w' on zoe is interesting and is unusual thus I'm looking forward to playing her on the live client. 

IF anything I need better fps support with my potato PC.

"interesting" doesn't touch on the fact that flash has been the absolute biggest impact overall on this games meta. wtf is riot thinking releasing a champion that can take up to 3 flashes from enemies, what kind of counterplay does that leave at all? You flash to try and escape her killing you she just uses her W without even wasting her own flash then she can simply flash out when needed or use it again to follow up further. Thats not even mentioning the fact it can steal item actives, literally leaving 0 counterplay.

Guess we'll just have to see what shes like on the PBE and wait for her to be released before we really know if theres no counter play?

I mean her q is her main dmg source and its pre hard to land and you need to practice it heaps to nail the combos. So if she misses her q's in fights then what good are her multiple flashes going to do if  she cant land combos and q's in a fight.

Her passive is basically a sheen proc and it really isn't hard to land her skill shot its an AOE that just has to be moved to an area and does increased damage the further it travels go watch the highlights and plays of her already out and see how much damage it does too when moved not that far of a distance
